short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Computer store specializes in computer repair, laptop repair and server support, online technical support.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New York's #1 Computer Repair Store
PlanetHome is a local and Online operated computer repair store, providing excellent customer service and satisfaction rates since 2008. PlanetHome specializes in computer and laptop repair and provides desktop and server support to our valued customers and businesses. We proudly serve customers and businesses accross the States including Canada and Australia.

We offer many plans for providing support to our valued customers and offer guaranteed resolution with 100% satisfaction. A satisfied customer is the key to growth in service industry and we follow the same to its fullest. For us our customers are a part of our family and their computer problems are our own. Be available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and 365 days a year to provide support to an end-user at any point of time. Offering custom based service plans to match the specific need of an end user and ensuring cost effectiveness

Common computer issues and problems are: Virus & Spyware removal, Laptop repair, Laptop Power Jack, No operating system found, Slow computer, Computer freezes, Computer keeps rebooting, Annoying pop-ups, Data Recovery, Network Setup, Server/Desktop Support.

We support major computer brand names such as: Dell, HP, Compaq, IBM, Lenovo, Toshiba, Sony, Gateway, Acer, Avertec, LG, Alienware, Asus, Fujitsu, Samsung, Panasonic, eMachines, Apple, MacBook, MacBook Pro, iPad and iPhone.

PlanetHome provides fast, affordable solutions to residential and business clients. Our certified technicians can provide service direct to your home or office on the same day you call, including weekends and evenings. Let us take care of all of your computer repair and service needs!

There is no computer problem that is too big or too small. Our certified technicians can fix a wide range of computer and laptop hardware and software problems. Whether your computer is infected, very slow, or you have no Internet connection- we will fix it for you.
